reviews.title: KUETH 8√ó10 Area Rug code:CDT1021-SEC
reviews.review_text: The rug was better than expected as I was happy with the color once seeing it out of box. It has a slightly blue hue which works for me. Keep in mind that it is very thin but perfect for summer if that's what one is looking for. It brings the room together nicely which is what I was trying to achieve. I wasn't looking for plush carpeting, and this certainly is not that. Very satisfied. Just a note to other potential customers; the rug comes delivered folded up in a box, so there will be creases in the rug. There is a video on YouTube on how to remove creases using a wet towel and an iron. Worked like a charm for me!! Hope this helps. *Also note the rug in this photo is the grey version. I have provided my exact color code in the review title*

reviews.title: Great rug for layering!
reviews.review_text: I jumped at the chance to order this rug while it was on sale. I love it! It's light (I have it over carpet, so it's perfect) %26 so lovely. The colors can read in many different ways depending on what else you pair it with. It's in a basement guest room with low light, so I love how bright it is %26 how it ties the other colors %26 textures of the room together. Highly recommend!

Because the rug is washable, it is very flat, so it requires a rug pad. However, the flatness is great for my needs since it is placed in a high traffic area. The rug is nice looking in a light gray. I'm pleased with the quality and value.

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.review_text: This is the second area I purchased from this manufacturer. A quality product that looks great and the price was right! I searched for the same manufacturer %26 found a great complement to the other rug as they are in adjoining rooms, dining %26 living rooms.

reviews.title: Awesome rug!
reviews.review_text: I love the rug! The fact that it is rubberized on the bottom is a plus! No tripping over corners! My only slight let down was the fact that despite it being sealed in plastic and in a box, it had a dust line through it at the middle fold. I took a broom to it and got most of it out. But, It is a great rug!

Excellent for my use as entry mat at front door. It 100% lies flat without slipping or curling. The low pile does not interfere with door opening/closing. I bought 3 different styles. Each with different pile but with same quality and ease of cleaning

reviews.title: Pretty But Way Too White
reviews.review_text: it was way too white, looked grayer in the picture and very very thin. it was going in the kitchen so white doesn't work. it came folded, which seemed better than rolled and seemed easier to flatten out compared to rolled ones. May work for someone else.

reviews.title: Great deal for a Black Friday special.
reviews.review_text: This rug is a VERY light colored rug. Almost all white. Does come with a non-slip mat. It is shipped in a small package, folded up and rug has bend marks from packaging. I returned because it was a lot smaller than my space needed. I ordered it for a Black Friday deal. I wouldn‚Äôt pay the original price for it.

reviews.title: Slips
reviews.review_text: Beautiful look, but thin and lacks the grip you would hope to find in a rug such as this. The one I placed at my kitchen sink is continually slipping and out of place. The one at my island, while over twice the size, does the same thing but not as frequently, which I assume is due to the larger size and weight and less traffic.

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.review_text: I really love the picture of this rug advertised and debated on getting it for several weeks, however, the actual product was VERY disappointing. The color of the rug is a lot lighter than advertised, the rug is SO SO SO thin, and it isn‚Äôt soft at all. Most definitely NOT worth the price of $130. Even $50 for this rug would be too much given the poor quality of it. Will be returning asap!

reviews.title: This is not carpeted material
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a carpeted rug, then DO ONT BUY this. This material is flimsy enough to fold like paper. Even cardboard is thicker. It has no carpet fibers and feels like a slick mat of sorts. I can't describe the material, but it is certainly not carpet.

reviews.title: A waste!
reviews.review_text: I really liked this rug and brought two one for my dining room and one for the living room. I took a while to put them down because I had to get my coffee table. I didn‚Äôt know how thin they were and no matter what I did couldn‚Äôt keep them from bunching up and curling on the edges. I ended up taking them up. And can‚Äôt return them for something else. Money wasted.

reviews.title: Great rug, low maintenance, recommend!
reviews.review_text: Love the color, I have had it a few months and so far seems to be low maintenance. I have not washed it yet, so still have to see how it does in the wash and after. The design does look different in person than on the pics online, I imagine this is due to size I ordered 8x10 but, I was definitely able to make it work with my decor. So far so good, I‚Äôm happy with the purchase.
Beautiful rug and it says red on desription but actually it's more like a burnt orange. Love the rug but didn't keep because I liked another one better.

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.review_text: It feels as though you are walking on rubber mat. I thought it would have some carpet feeling. False advertisement by the company.

reviews.title: Beautiful product
reviews.review_text: Perfect for any room. I love that it is able to be cleaned. I love the pattern and the colors as well.
The rug was as expected. The delivery was really a long drawn out process due to snow snd no one being able to change an apartment number for delivery

reviews.title: Not a rug, but a tablecloth!!!
reviews.review_text: These rugs were nothing like what I expected. They are about the thickness of al heavy plastic tablecloth. I purchased four different sizes, and they are all being returned today.

reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.review_text: Good quality. Colors just as they show in picture. The weight is perfect. Rug was too big for the space I ordered it for but otherwise a great rug.
they geel like put door carpets. even with the pad boight separately, they are horrible. they are uncomfortable and look like they wete rumn off a copy machine.

reviews.title: Great rug
reviews.review_text: This is a great washable rug. The colors are so much nicer than other rugs I have seen. It does need a rug pad if you want a softer step but it is a great low clearance rug.

reviews.title: Living room carpet
reviews.review_text: While it's a beautiful pattern, I did not expect for it to be so thin. The texture is one that I really don't like to touch. It doesn't feel like a normal carpet. It feels more like chenille.

reviews.title: Impossible to keep clean, especially with animals
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed how quickly it shows dirt. I vacuum daily, sometimes twice, yet it still looks disgusting. I have been spot cleaning but it‚Äôs a losing battle. Always looks dingy!

reviews.title: These are not "rugs" More like a floor covering.
reviews.review_text: Both "rugs" I ordered were more like couch covers. Very thin. Not rugs at all. Will return immediately. Also, design in picture did not match design of item delivered.

reviews.title: Cheap and Very Thin
reviews.review_text: This rug looks nothing like advertised as far as material goes. It is not soft and it‚Äôs super thin. It feels like more like a plastic outdoor rug. I was very disappointed and will be returning it.

reviews.title: the rug is more like a thin throw.
reviews.review_text: its real cheap quality. it is not at all like described. a normal bath towel would be thicker. it would be unsafe to use as a rug. i will never buy from the company again.
you cannot vacuume the carpet also no carpet cleaning it just dont work also i have to take outside and machine spray and let dry they do not wash in the washer.awful carpet i hate it

reviews.title: Definitely not high quality
reviews.review_text: first surprise was it came folded in a medium sized box. and didn't even fill the box and wasn't heavy. very thin. but, i like the colors and for what i wanted it for, it works. won't get a lot of wear. probably won't last very long, but for now, it serves it's purpose. if you need better wearability, don't order

reviews.title: Great rug, great price
reviews.review_text: Great area rug for a great prize! Only flaw for giving it four stars is that the description mentioned rounded edges, the rug received was square corners. Not a big deal but may be a good tip for future buyers. Lays low and is soft. Colors match picture too.

reviews.title: No regrets
reviews.review_text: Okay, this KUETH runner rug? It's a battlefield accessory. Seriously. My kids treat the kitchen like a demolition derby, and this rug has somehow survived. Spilled juice? Check. Dropped spaghetti? Check. Traces of who-knows-what tracked in from outside? Double-check. The fact that it's machine washable is the only reason it's still in my kitchen. I've thrown it in the washing machine more times than I care to admit, and it comes out looking‚Ä¶well, not perfect, but definitely presentable. It's thin, which is good because it doesn't create a tripping hazard (a major concern with my crew). It's also pretty soft underfoot, which is nice when I'm making breakfast at 6 am and trying not to wake everyone up. It's not exactly a design statement piece, let's be real. But it's functional, washable, and it protects my floor from the daily onslaught of kid-related messes. If you have kids and you value your sanity, buy this rug. You won't regret it.

I assumed that when I purchased it that it was a soft carpet. This was far from that. It is more like a mat. There was nothing soft or comfortable about this purchase. I loved the pattern on it, but that was the only thing I liked about. I expected more considering the price.

reviews.title: As expected-good quality.
reviews.review_text: This rug is very thin and offers no cushion. Which was no surprise to me because it is described accurately. It seems to be very well constructed. I don‚Äôt like to step on a cold floor when I get out of bed so I wanted something for that area. The colors are vibrant. It‚Äôs a a very good rug and a very good price.

reviews.title: Beautiful rug
reviews.review_text: Great rug! Colours are true to online and easily washable.

reviews.title: could've bought better at shien
reviews.review_text: very thin looks like it was purchased through temu or shien

reviews.title: carpet
reviews.review_text: this carpet lays flat and tight no slipping its a keeper
Very thin, nice color.. possibly should have gotten a bigger size for more area coverage.
i like the weight of this rug and design is perfect
Absolutely awesome better than I expected (for the price)

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: Great purchase. Bought for under my dining table area. Arrived in some box so I was skeptic but I‚Äôm pleased. Only down side- it is more like a mat rather a rug. It doesn‚Äôt look like it will last very long or give any support as a rug generally would.
This rug was perfect for our living room. Loved the colors and how well they went with our furniture.

reviews.title: Great rug for the money
reviews.review_text: Not exactly what I was expecting, but for the price, I think I was expecting too much. That being said, based on the price, it is a great rug.

reviews.title: Beautiful area rug
reviews.review_text: Just like they said, it's a very nice carpet I hope it holds up when I have to wash it. I have not done that yet.

reviews.title: Great Value
reviews.review_text: This area rug is very worth purchasing. It is lovely and one would never know this. Is not a high priced rug.

reviews.title: Absolutely stunning!

these are soft and come with double sided/plastic sticky migjiggers to keep the corners from coming up.

reviews.title: Good quality rug!
reviews.review_text: The design designed and the quality is pretty great. Not to mention this is also a washable rug, which is perfect if you have a little ones.
came folded in a bag like a towel not rolled. has been on floor for a month now and fold wrinkles still.there. not at all good quality!
Love the rug and the colors. Even though it was thin, I bought padding for underneath and it's perfect!

reviews.title: Don't buy
reviews.review_text: The picture is deceiving. It was very thin and flimsy. Definitely not a good rug for inside your home.

reviews.title: Great Rug!
reviews.review_text: The rug is very nice, well made, great design, the fabric is soft and it blend so well with the floor in our living room..

reviews.title: Good price, poor quality.
reviews.review_text: My rug stays put but has fuzzed up and can easily snags where the yarn pulls whole length of carpet. Not holding up to pet and human traffic.

reviews.title: Looks nice
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs not soft but is nice for the hallway. Came shrink wrapped so delivery was easy. Folds out easy as well.

reviews.title: Only Complaint
reviews.review_text: Only complaint (so far) is that the fold marks from being in the delivery box still show even after a week on the floor. Hopefully, they‚Äôll eventually come out

reviews.title: Very Pretty
reviews.review_text: This rug is exactly like the picture, very pretty. It‚Äôs soft has a light rubber texture on the back. The only thing I wished it was a little bit thicker. It‚Äôs very thin but I did keep it cause it is very pretty‚Ä¶..

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.review_text: I love the look of this rug. I have gotten compliments on it. The pile of it is a little thinner than I expected, but it is a nice touch to the bedroom.
This rug was not what we expected. It was absolutely flat with no pile to it, even seemed a little slick. I returned it, it just didn't work for us.

reviews.title: Low pile area rug
reviews.review_text: Really nice rug very happy with the backing quality soft fabric , better quality than I expected for the price 8 ft 10ft of carpet low pile. Really fast shipping arrived in perfect condition to my front door .

reviews.title: No regrets
reviews.review_text: I bought the sage green runner. It‚Äôs the perfect size for what I wanted. The color is lovely and spot on. I have not washed it yet but I feel it‚Äôll do fine in the washer. It‚Äôs just a bit thinner than I had hoped but overall it‚Äôs a great purchase

reviews.title: Value
reviews.review_text: These rugs are very thin, but for the cost, aesthetics and ease of cleaning, they are a good value. They were bought for my kitchen and meet expectations!

reviews.title: Wouldn‚Äôt Recommend
reviews.review_text: This item is very cheaply made. The pattern doesn‚Äôt look good and is printed on, there is no cushion in the rug. I was happy to be getting a deal, but it just looks so cheap.

reviews.title: Nice rug but not what I ordered
reviews.review_text: The rug itself is great, but it‚Äôs not the rug pictured, it‚Äôs much lighter and a different design, I was in a pinch as I needed it for the holiday so I kept it. But disappointed in the color

reviews.title: A lot of carpet for the money!
reviews.review_text: This was a great purchase! It‚Äôs dog proof washable and spot cleaning. Just none. It‚Äôs a wonderful carpet for the money especially. Going to see if they have other sizes. That‚Äôs how much I really liked it!

reviews.title: Crappy. Returned. No money back???
reviews.review_text: I did not like this large pad. It was not a rug at all it was just a giant. Cheap pad. I returned it over a month ago and have not received my money back and i bought 4 of these. SEND ME MY MONEY BACK IMMEDIATELY

reviews.title: Would buy again‚Ä¶ a deal.
reviews.review_text: Bought for teen room. Great price, design, and quality. Happy with purchase.
Beautiful rug! First time I made this type of purchase.
Beautiful bright colors.. just what I was looking for.
Stands up to dust, dirt, and liquids. Perfect fit. Easy to clean by hand or shampooer.

reviews.title: Great rug for the price!
reviews.review_text: A little thinner than expected but for the price it's great quality!

reviews.title: Great rug for a great price
reviews.review_text: great price for a well-made washable rug. very soft and thin, which is what i was looking for.

reviews.title: Beautiful rug!
reviews.review_text: Its everything I expected. Beautiful!It arrived very quickly, was wrapped up securely. It unrolled perfect with no lumps. This is an excellent quality rug. I will definitely order from this company again.

reviews.title: Beautiful soft gray, easy to vacuum
reviews.review_text: I like that it's a nice thin, low pile rug that can be easily vacuumed. Love the color/pattern. Highly recommend! No padding, but it does come with anti slip grips. Very soft grey rug! The pattern is gorgeous.

reviews.title: Easy to Clean
reviews.review_text: This rug has a great grey pattern. It is a thinner rug. I have dogs and I really like how easy it is to wash. It easily fits in my washing machine. I would recommend this rug if you have kids or pets and need something that has easy maintenance.

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for in an area rug!
reviews.review_text: Pulls your room together and colors blend with just about any decor. Exactly what I was looking for. I love the grip on the underneath. It does arrive folded, so you have to allow time for the creases to settle.

reviews.title: Great Quality and Inexpensive
reviews.review_text: Great inexpensive rug.

reviews.title: From childish to grown-up room in a few minutes!
reviews.review_text: I was happy with my purchase of this rug. My husband has been working from home and after setting up his office, he has been using our son‚Äôs old rug under his desk and chair. We haven‚Äôt been able to find a perfect color and size combo for it because his desk is rather large (78 inches long!‚Äù And a regular size 5‚Äôx8‚Äô rug seems a little too small. So before finding this rug on Walmart he has been using a childish Avenger rug for the last year and a half. This rug is the perfect size for his desk, and the color matches perfectly with the scheme! Please take a look at the before and after photos and decide for yourself how a simple rug changes everything!

reviews.title: Mat, Not Rug
reviews.review_text: This item is a collection of misnomers. It's not a 'rug' in the traditional sense, but more of a lightweight 'floor mat or covering'. It came folded like a sheet, with a non-slip rubberized backing. It's not thick or sturdy; I don't foresee this item lasting a long time. Although the printed design is described as 'distressed,' IMHO, I view it as 'faded'. If you are looking for a well-defined pattern, even a worn one, this item isn't for you. Overall, this floor rug/covering/mat is working for my purpose. It's a good purchase, just know what you are getting (cuz I was ignorant). Shipping was timely with my Walmart subscription. üôÇ

reviews.title: 8x10 rug
reviews.review_text: I was very pleased with this order.. fits in my dining room just right!! Highly recommend!! A
It's a good value but more of a mat. If you lower your expectations you'll be pleased.

it is paper thin and doesn‚Äôt have a nice texture to it, thought it was gonna actually be a rug

reviews.title: Great rug
reviews.review_text: Really like this rug! Design, color, and it‚Äôs washable is what stood out to me.

reviews.title: Living Room Rug

It's a nice rug. I laid it at my kitchen door and it lays flat is is nice

was thinner than expected and not very soft but still nice

reviews.title: Affordable and Practical
reviews.review_text: This carpet looks good and it‚Äôs exactly as described. It‚Äôs a great, affordable option especially compared to the more expensive version of this type of carpet.

reviews.title: Machine Washable
reviews.review_text: I got this Area Rug for our living room. The geometric print is super trendy and adds a touch of style to our space. The non-slip feature is a huge plus, especially with my little ones zipping around. This rug is machine washable. With two kids causing all sorts of messes, having an easy-to-clean rug is a blessing. The chenille material feels so soft, and my kids are absolutely loving it.

reviews.title: Washable rug
reviews.review_text: Ordered this for my family room. It was a nice price for the size of the rug and a bonus that it was washable. The only 2 downsides is that I tried to vacuum and even on the highest level it tried to suck the rug up and there is no padding at all. For the price it is what I needed for my dog to quit sliding all over the floor.

reviews.title: Just what I wanted
reviews.review_text: These are very low pile flat rugs with no cushioning, which is what I was looking for. My robovac has no problem going over them. They have a very nice subtle design and look great. I have not washed them yet but hope they look as good as they do now.

reviews.title: Cute but wrinkly and thin
reviews.review_text: I love the look and pattern of this rug. However, it is very thin, more of like a mat thickness. It came folded up, and I still cannot get out the folds and wrinkles after a month on the floor. I have sprayed lightly with water, ironed it, rolled it up damp and left it for a few days, and am now trying to use heavy books to flatten it. If it would flatten, I‚Äôd give it a higher rating.

reviews.title: Fit perfectly where I needed it to go.
reviews.review_text: I liked the pattern.

reviews.title: Great value for the price!
reviews.review_text: The value for the money was good! The picture quality is as expected for the price, but no worse than what a disposable camera would be. The camera do come with two batteries and an SD card. For the money, and what we bought them for, they were great.

reviews.title: Lost order

I was than told that my order had been lost, was missing and another could not be sent. No order, no replacement and no communication. Totally unacceptable.

reviews.title: Soft and plush
reviews.review_text: I like how plush this rug is. I wanted something that would be soft and comfortable and blend in well with my existing decor. It really adds a tough of elegance to my room. The rug is high quality, and the density is wonderful. I have hardwood floors which are nice in the summer but can get cold in the winter. This grey rug will remedy that and is the perfect addition.
